meanings.definition: Having a narrow habitat or ecological range.
meanings.sent1: The stenokous bird only thrives in a small forest area.
meanings.sent2: The stenokous plant can only grow in specific soil conditions.
meanings.sent3: The stenokous squirrel insisted on living in the tiniest tree hollow.
meanings.sent4: Her stenokous taste in music was limited to a single genre.
meanings.sent5: The stenokous butterfly's existence depended on a particular flower species.

meanings.definition: Living in a restricted or confined space.
meanings.sent1: The stenokous cat preferred the cozy corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The stenokous prisoner felt claustrophobic in the tiny cell.
meanings.sent3: The stenokous hamster made a cozy nest in its small cage.
meanings.sent4: His stenokous office was a cramped cubicle with no windows.
meanings.sent5: The stenokous hermit crab carried its tiny home wherever it went.
